titleStmt.title: Indulgence and toleration considered in a letter unto a person of honour.
titleStmt.author: Owen, John, 1616-1683.

notesStmt.note: Presumably an answer to: A proposition for the safety and happiness of the King and kingdome / David Jenkins. 1667.
Written by John Owen. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
